moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: After You
moves.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
